caption: Dennis Hopper
name: Edward Ruscha
works: Large Trademark with Eight Spotlights (1961),Every Building on the Sunset Strip (1966),Standard Station (1966)
summary: Edward Joseph Ruscha IV (roo-SHAY; born December 16, 1937) is an American artist associated with the pop art movement. He has worked in the media of painting, printmaking, drawing, photography, and film. Ruscha lives and works in Culver City, California.
